channel.title: Easy drum programming
channel.description:
Is there a way to easily set up/program a drum track? I'm using Reaper, I've looked for a plugin for that in the past, but they were all pretty complicated.
An external program is fine too though. I imagine there's stuff like this for practising guitar. As long as I can get the track into Reaper somehow.
Any help is appreciated, thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: Easy drum programming
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Well, as I said, I consider myself a pretty crappy guitar player, and I’m very inexperienced when it comes to recording shit so most of my stuff sounds pretty bad, probably.

If I had to put a genre on it, I’d probably say something like post-punk. Alternative/rock kinda stuff in any case.

Anyway, it’s this (soundcloud) song that I wish to re-record.
I will probably change the structure of the song somewhat though, and I may want to speed up the rhythm, change the tone of some of the instruments… not 100% sure yet.

If you like, I can send you my REAPER project, may make it easier to add a track.

Would be really cool if you record something, so thanks already
